name: A Journey in Chaos
description:
Once every 2 billion years, the universe gives life to the constellations for one night. During this night, the celestial beings meet in the Gaia's Nebuleuse to accomplish the FUSION ritual. During the FUSION, the Celestials join their cosmic energy to create new constellations and bring more light to the universe. The FUSION is vital to maintain life in this universe which becomes darker as it extends through time.

 As the Dragon incarnation, will you be able to accomplish your duty?
